name: createRepostAction
title: Repost Action Builder
oneLiner: Reactive state manager for tracking and creating reposts and quote posts on Nostr

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event to track reposts for

returns.name: count
returns.description: Total number of unique users who have reposted (includes both regular reposts and quotes)

returns.name: hasReposted
returns.description: Whether the current user has reposted this event

returns.name: pubkeys
returns.description: Array of unique pubkeys who have reposted

returns.name: repost
returns.description: Toggle repost - creates repost if not reposted, deletes existing repost if already reposted

returns.name: quote
returns.description: Create a quote post with commentary on the original event
